DOC.brief_summary: A prospective trail. Pregnant women in the first trimester with positive BHCG and no visualization of gestational sac will be recruited. The correlation between endometrial pattern and ectopic pregnancy will be assessed.
DOC.brief_title: The Correlation Between Uterine Endometrial Pattern and Ectopic Pregnancy
DOC.criteria: First trimester of pregnancy No visualization of gestational sac Hemodynamic instability
